name: Dicehead
description:
The goal of the game is to save dicette  a little dice fairy. 

Commands :

- In the menu, navigate with the I or O keys (or shoulders on controller) 

- You validate your choice with the SPACE or J keys (or A on xbox controller) 

- You can move with Q/A and D (or the left joystick on a controller) 

- You can jump with J or SPACE (or A on a controller) 

- You can launch a dice with K (or X on a xbox controller)

Gameplay Details :

When you launch a dice , you will roll 4 times forward, so be careful to the void ! 

It will change the stat you have selected (with the I or O keys, or shoulders on controller) to a random value. 

In the selection menu, you can choose if your dice will have more chance to have high and low value, or if it will be more safe. 

You can choose one type of dice for each stat : 

- Jump 

- Speed

- Adhesion to walls 

However be careful when trying to change your stats because each time you launch a dice, the Enemy level  will change randomly affecting the enemies and their projectiles' moving speed. 

Hopefully, when you roll you can destroy ennemies and you are invulnerable.
